channel.title: CVE Feed for prismtechstudios -- Modern Footnotes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for prismtechstudios -- Modern Footnotes

item.title: CVE-2023-5618|2024-08-02T08:07:32.229Z -- prismtechstudios -- modern%20footnotes
item.description: The Modern Footnotes plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's shortcode in versions up to, and including, 1.4.16 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
